Source.Name: openoffice
Source.Description: OpenOffice.org is an open source, multi-platform office productivity suite. It includes key desktop applications such as a word processor, a spreadsheet application, a presentation creator-viewer, a formula editor and a drawing program, with a user interface and feature set similar to other office suites. Sophisticated and flexible, OpenOffice.org also works transparently with a variety of file formats, including those of Microsoft Office.

Package.Name: openoffice-kde
Package.Description: openoffice-kde provides context menu options for "Create New" entry of Konqueror.

Package.Name: openoffice-python
Package.Description: openoffice-python is Python binding for the OpenOffice.org UNO component model. Allows scripts both external to OpenOffice and within the internal OpenOffice scripting module to be written in python.

Package.Name: openoffice-extension-pdfimport
Package.Description: openoffice-extension-pdfimpor imports PDF into drawing documents to preserve layout and enable basic editing of PDF documents.

Package.Name: openoffice-extension-presenter-screen
Package.Description: openoffice-extension-presenter-screen provides information on a second screen, that typically is not visible to the audience when delivering a presentation. e.g. slide notes.

Package.Name: openoffice-extension-presentation-minimizer
Package.Summary: Shrink the file size of OpenOffice.org presentations
Package.Description: openoffice-extension-presentation-minimizer is used to reduce the file size of the current presentation. Images will be compressed, and data that is no longer needed will be removed.

Package.Name: openoffice-extension-report-builder
Package.Description: openoffice-extension-report-builder creates database reports from OpenOffice.org Base. The report builder can define group and page headers as well as group, page footers and calculation fields to accomplish complex database reports.

Package.Name: openoffice-extension-wiki-publisher
Package.Summary: Create Wiki articles on MediaWiki servers
Package.Description: openoffice-extension-wiki-publisher enables you to create Wiki articles on MediaWiki servers without having to know the syntax of the MediaWiki markup language. Publish your new and existing documents transparently with OpenOffice.org Writer to a wiki page.

Package.Name: openoffice-langpack-de-extras
Package.Summary: Extra German presentation backgrounds for OpenOffice.org

Package.Name: openoffice-langpack-pt-BR
Package.Summary: Brazilian Portuguese language files for OpenOffice.org

Update.Comment: Fix version and remove libwp family dependencies.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Use internal libwp family and make extension install failures non-fatal
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Mass rebuild for Pardus Corporate 2 Alpha 3
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Version bump to OpenOffice 3.2.1 RC3. Also Hungarian locale added due to the request of Daniel Kovács.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: KDE4 integration seems stable now, enable it.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest bug fix release.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix installation of OO.org extensions. Raise exception if extension could not be installed/removed.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to 3.2 series. Check http://www.openoffice.org/dev_docs/features/3.2/ for release notes.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix 'Invalid sheet reference' bug using a Calc.xcu workaround, #11530
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: * Make ootool and ooconfig work, fix ooo-wrapper.py. * Remove duplicate .desktop files, use just our desktop files.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Bump to latest bugfix release of 3.1 series.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Switch to oxygen icon theme for better KDE integration.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest stable release, also includes a security update: * Fix encoding of URIs of external references and chart data range loss. * Single fix for possible data loss with graphics in impress/draw * Work-around for looping grammar checkers that do not properly advance sentence by sentence. * Localization fixes for OOo 3.1.1 * Impress and Draw bug fixes for 3.1.1 * Improvement of pdf import extension * GSL issues for target OOo311 (underline/overline colors in the new DrawingLayer)
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Split out presentation background of German langpack to make more space in international CD.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fixes about extension installation. We have to set JAVA_HOME to install some extensions.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Version bump to stable 3.1 release, finally after seventh rc.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Update intro and about splashes for Pardus 2009, and version bump to 3.1rc6
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix desktop files to make them XDG compliant.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Version bump to 2.4.1, color of the progress bar in splash is changed to white also
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Stable update and add Spanish support, should fix #5265 and #6432
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Don't check FQDN on startup, slowing down when there is no network
